title: Stuck at loading screen
body:
I can pick and ban champions fine and the game enters the loading screen but I'm stuck at 0% for a long time and its not like I have bad connection (40 ms) then when I finally join after 5 minutes my team already /remake and I lost my LP. Is there any way to fix this or is this a server problem?

Update: I joined another game and the screen was stuck in the black screen and I got reported.

replies.body:
If this is an issue for client crashes, try the following:

1. When everyone else is 100% in loading screen and your 0%, this probably means your client has crashed and you need to reconnect back in.

2. Try using the Repair client tool and re-starting your league of legends client.

If this is an issue for high ping, try the following:

1. Turn your Router/Modem off for 20-30 seconds than reboot it back up and test if the ping is better in a custom game.

2. Try contacting your ISP about your internet service plan you're paying for. If you had lower ms normally and recently have been getting very high ms, it may be on there end. You will have to ask about your download/upload speed.

3. Try contacting Riot through the support ticket and see if it's on there end.

The issue you're describing is generally caused by an unstable connection to the server. I recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), which goes over the most common solutions for this.

Get back to me if you still see issues after working through that guide.
